short_summary: Two enclose trailers to be deliver to Quebec base.
description: A public tender is done on May 30, 2023 to deliver two (2) enclosed trailers. Mark a due date on June 16 2023, at 14:00
duration_in_months: With project finish date on September 1, 2023, and stairst project start date June 19, 2023, which is about 3 months.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: Rimouski

#### Title
Enclosed Trailers for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police in Rimouski

#### Reference Number
cb-5981-97788190

#### Publication and Closing Dates
*Published on:* Wednesday, May 30th, 2023
*Tender Closing Date:* Friday, June 16th, 2023 at 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time

#### Request for Proposal Details

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a competitive bid to acquire two (2) enclosed trailers. The trailers are required to be delivered to one location in Rimouski, Quebec.

#### Tender Details
* Procurement Method: Open Competitive Bidding
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: Rimouski, Quebec

#### Contract Details
* Expected Contract Start Date: Monday, June 19th, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: Thursday, September 01st, 2023
* Contracting Entity: Royal Canadian Mounted Police
* Contracting Entity Address: 4225 Dorchester, Westmount, Quebec, H3Z 1V5 Canada

#### Contact Information
* Jed Ben Aoun, Contracting Officer
* Phone: 438-945-8136
* Email: [Jed.BenAoun@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:Jed.BenAoun@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)

#### Tender Document
The tender document, including the solicitation and amendments, is available on the Canada Buys website: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/)

Note: All attachments are available on the Canada Buys website. Responses must be submitted electronically through the Canada Buys system.

The RCMP expects to award a contract based on the lowest price submitted as per the selection criteria. We look forward to receiving your proposal.
